ComicInfo.Summary: Francine spends months by David's side, helping him recuperate from his serious injuries. With Katchoo absent, David shares the secrets of his violent past and the friendship between him and Francine grows until they become close ? very close. Meanwhile, Katchoo spends months retraining herself with only one goal in mind: revenge, and the complete annihilation of the enemies that have destroyed her life. PLUS! More Paper Dolls! Collect all the sexy new clothes for the Francine and Katchoo paper dolls!
ComicInfo.Title: The Black Of Your Heart
